data.enText: Einstein's theory of the universe based on the principle that all movement is relative and that time is a fourth dimension related to space
the state of being relative and only able to be judged when compared with sth else

simple_means.memory_skill: relative 相对的 + ivity …性 → 相对论；相关性

tr: the quality of being relative and having significance only in relation to something else
(physics) the theory that space and time are relative concepts rather than absolute concepts

value.def: The theory of relativity is Einstein's theory concerning space, time, and motion.

rootsaffixes.indicate: 表名词，“…力，…性；情况，状态”，由-ive + -ity构成
rootsaffixes.title: -ivity

partsOfSpeech.dec: captive 被监禁了的；被控制的 + ivity …力，…性；情况，状态 → 囚禁，拘留
conductive 传导的 + ivity …力，…性；情况，状态 → 传导性
creative 创造性的 + ivity …力，…性；情况，状态 → 创造力
productive 生产的 + ivity …力，…性；情况，状态 → 生产力
relative 相对的 + ivity …力，…性；情况，状态 → 相对论；相关性
resistive 抵抗的 + ivity …力，…性；情况，状态 → 抵抗力
selective 选择性的 + ivity …力，…性；情况，状态 → 选择性
sensitive 敏感的 + ivity …性；状态 → 敏感（度）
